title: Circular
title-note: Utah Geological Survey and prececessor organizations
additional-notes: This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
Spot-checks of issues from the 1960s did not turn up copyright notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
